full_summary:
**F6855-230738: Procurement of Escape Hatches for CCGS Ann Harvey**
=====================================================

**Title**
--------

* English: Procurement of Escape Hatches for CCGS Ann Harvey
* French: Procurro d'écoutilles de secours pour le NGCANN Harvey.

**Reference Information**
------------------------

* Solicitation Number: WS4333989441
* Tender Reference Number: WS4333989441-Doc4337673333
* Amendment Number: 1

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**End-User Entities**
--------------------

* Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E6

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Jonathan Grant, SPAC/PSPC (il-lui / he-him)
* Email: jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Procurement Schedule**
-----------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-05T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-10
* Expected Contract End Date: None

You can find more details and attachments at the [Ariba Discovery link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18181087?extsite=MTgxODEwODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website. [1]

**Status**
----------

The procurement has been cancelled. [2]

[1] Ariba Discovery link is only available with a valid Ariba account.

[2] Note: Although the procurement has been cancelled, the information above remains for reference purposes.]);;0
